entry.title: Hello_world
entry.content:
#Welcome to my little slice of the Internet!
My name is Trevor Reed, and I will be your guide through this simple website. Some of you may be asking "Why am I here?" or even "What is the purpose of this website?". While I cannot answer for you, why you are here, I can tell you what my intended use for this website is. I plan on using the site for sharing my insights into the ever changing world of Technology. I know there are coutless sites on the Internet where you can read about the newest technology, and I know I could never compete with those, however I believe that there is always room for one more voice on how to improve our lives with new technology.
